review: remarkable little caster. Crazy easy to set up. Steaming quality is very good. If you are casting to the device the chromecast will link up with your wireless network and automatically stram straight from the router to the unit which means there is no drain on your device's battery, and you can continue using any other aps on your device without affecting what you are watching. Only reason it did not get 5 stars is because the stuff that you can cast is a little limited, but with time google should remedy this.what keeps it a 4 star is the easy of casting loopholes that allow you to literally watch anything on the internet. If you cannot cast something, for example if you use Hulu but dont have a Hulu+ account (can only cast Hulu+ not free Hulu), you can mirror your device or computer. To do this download Google Chrome web browser, then install the chromecast app and bam, you can mirror anything to your tv that you can pull up in the Chrome browser.-mirroring from Google Chrome is not the same as casting from an app like Netflix or HBO Go, mirroring will drain the battery of your device, Or if it is a laptop the quality will degrade the further from the tv you move the computer. Picture quality is not as good either.Verdict: Great cheep alternative to apple tv, roku, or amazon fire stick. portable (travel on the weekends) and can take with you anywhere. easy of use and ability to find a way to cast anything makes this a strong buy recommendation. Dont  buy a smart tv, they are slow and expensive. update your old tv with a chromecast.
